User Login View¶

tracktivityPetsWebsite.views.user_login.user_login(request)[source]¶

The user_login function validates the username and password logs the user in if they are valid.

If the user has selected the “remember me” checkbox, their session will remain valid for whatever is set in settings.REMEMBER_ME_DURATION, at the time of writing this it is 1 year.

If the users credentials are incorrect, a validation error message is returned.

Once logged in, the user is redirected to the dashboard.
